016package io.micronaut.maven.jib;
017
018import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.buildplan.*;
019import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.buildplan.UnixPathParser;
020import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.extension.JibMavenPluginExtension;
021import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.maven.extension.MavenData;
022import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.plugins.extension.ExtensionLogger;
023import io.micronaut.core.util.StringUtils;
024import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
025import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
026import org.apache.maven.artifact.versioning.ArtifactVersion;
027import org.apache.maven.artifact.versioning.DefaultArtifactVersion;
028
029import java.util.*;
030
031/**
032 * Jib extension to support building Docker images.
033 *
034 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
035 * @since 1.1
036 */
037public class JibMicronautExtension implements JibMavenPluginExtension<Void> {
038
039    public static final String DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE = "eclipse-temurin:17-alpine";
040    private static final String LATEST_TAG = "latest";
041
042    @Override
043    public Optional<Class<Void>> getExtraConfigType() {
044        return Optional.empty();
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public ContainerBuildPlan extendContainerBuildPlan(ContainerBuildPlan buildPlan, Map<String, String> properties,
049                                                       Optional<Void> extraConfig, MavenData mavenData,
050                                                       ExtensionLogger logger) {
051
052        ContainerBuildPlan.Builder builder = buildPlan.toBuilder();
053        MicronautRuntime runtime = MicronautRuntime.valueOf(mavenData.getMavenProject().getProperties().getProperty(MicronautRuntime.PROPERTY, "none").toUpperCase());
054
055        JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService = new JibConfigurationService(mavenData.getMavenProject());
056
057        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(buildPlan.getBaseImage())) {
058            builder.setBaseImage(DEFAULT_BASE_IMAGE);
059        }
060
061        ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService = new ApplicationConfigurationService(mavenData.getMavenProject());
062        try {
063            int port = Integer.parseInt(applicationConfigurationService.getServerPort());
064            if (port > 0) {
065                logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Exposing port: " + port);
066                builder.addExposedPort(Port.tcp(port));
067            }
068        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {
069            // ignore, can't automatically expose port
070            logger.log(ExtensionLogger.LogLevel.LIFECYCLE, "Dynamically resolved port present. Ensure the port is correctly exposed in the <container> configuration. See https://github.com/GoogleContainerTools/jib/tree/master/jib-maven-plugin#example for an example.");
071        }
072
073        switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
074            case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> {
075                List<? extends LayerObject> originalLayers = buildPlan.getLayers();
076                builder.setLayers(Collections.emptyList());
077                for (LayerObject layer : originalLayers) {
078                    builder.addLayer(remapLayer(layer));
079                }
080                List<String> cmd = jibConfigurationService.getArgs();
081                if (cmd.isEmpty()) {
082                    cmd = Collections.singletonList("io.micronaut.oraclecloud.function.http.HttpFunction::handleRequest");
083                }
084                builder.setBaseImage("fnproject/fn-java-fdk:" + determineProjectFnVersion())
085                        .setWorkingDirectory(AbsoluteUnixPath.get(jibConfigurationService.getWorkingDirectory().orElse("/function")))
086                        .setEntrypoint(buildProjectFnEntrypoint())
087                        .setCmd(cmd);
088            }
089            case LAMBDA -> {
090                List<String> entrypoint = buildPlan.getEntrypoint();
091                Objects.requireNonNull(entrypoint).set(entrypoint.size() - 1, "io.micronaut.function.aws.runtime.MicronautLambdaRuntime");
092                builder.setEntrypoint(entrypoint);
093            }
094            default -> {
095                //no op
096            }
097        }
098        return builder.build();
099    }
100
101    public static List<String> buildProjectFnEntrypoint() {
102        List<String> entrypoint = new ArrayList<>(9);
103        entrypoint.add("/usr/java/latest/bin/java");
104        entrypoint.add("java");
105        entrypoint.add("-XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions");
106        entrypoint.add("-XX:+UseCGroupMemoryLimitForHeap");
107        entrypoint.add("-XX:-UsePerfData");
108        entrypoint.add("-XX:MaxRAMFraction=2");
109        entrypoint.add("-XX:+UseSerialGC");
110        entrypoint.add("-Xshare:on");
111        entrypoint.add("-Djava.library.path=/function/runtime/lib");
112        entrypoint.add("-cp");
113        entrypoint.add("/function/app/classes:/function/app/libs/*:/function/app/resources:/function/runtime/*");
114        entrypoint.add("com.fnproject.fn.runtime.EntryPoint");
115        return entrypoint;
116    }
117
118    public static String determineProjectFnVersion() {
119        ArtifactVersion javaVersion = new DefaultArtifactVersion(System.getProperty("java.version"));
120        if (javaVersion.getMajorVersion() >= 17) {
121            return "jre17-latest";
122        } else {
123            return LATEST_TAG;
124        }
125    }
126
127    private LayerObject remapLayer(LayerObject layerObject) {
128        FileEntriesLayer originalLayer = (FileEntriesLayer) layerObject;
129        FileEntriesLayer.Builder builder = FileEntriesLayer.builder().setName(originalLayer.getName());
130        for (FileEntry originalEntry : originalLayer.getEntries()) {
131            builder.addEntry(remapEntry(originalEntry, layerObject.getName()));
132        }
133
134        return builder.build();
135    }
136
137    private FileEntry remapEntry(FileEntry originalEntry, String layerName) {
138        List<String> pathComponents = UnixPathParser.parse(originalEntry.getExtractionPath().toString());
139        AbsoluteUnixPath newPath;
140        if (layerName.contains("dependencies")) {
141            newPath = AbsoluteUnixPath.get("/function/app/libs/" + pathComponents.get(pathComponents.size() - 1));
142        } else {
143            //classes or resources
144            newPath = AbsoluteUnixPath.get("/function" + originalEntry.getExtractionPath());
145        }
146
147        return new FileEntry(originalEntry.getSourceFile(), newPath, originalEntry.getPermissions(),
148                originalEntry.getModificationTime(), originalEntry.getOwnership());
149    }
150
151}
